      public void showMap​(com.google.gson.JsonArray theMap, ClientReaderTask clientReaderTask)
      Method to display the game map.
      Parameters:
      theMap - JsonArray that contains the map. Will be received by the client from the server with gameStarted-JSON-message.

      private void addSpawnButton​(int x, int y, ClientReaderTask clientReaderTask)
      Method to show a button as spawn-field, is used by method displayMap
      Parameters:
      x - x-position where to show spawn-field
      y - y-position where to show spawn-field

    • removePlayerFromOldField

      public void removePlayerFromOldField​(int column, int row)
      Method to remove a player on the map.
      Parameters:
      column - x-position of the player
      row - y-position of the player

    • showPlayer

      public void showPlayer​(int posX, int posY, String orientation, int figure)
      Method to show a player on the map.
      Parameters:
      posX - x-position of the player
      posY - y-position of the player
      orientation - current orientation of the player
      figure - figure number of the player (between 0 and 5)
